title: admin read ples
body: team wanted to report me even tho I as 1st pick whent mid calld mid so 2nd pick whent sup said sup 3rd pick instaclock brum sup and they fucking reported me ?? wtf did I do to them

replies.body:
You were probably reported because your attitude is trash kid. If you got a problem send it to [these](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) guys, they are paid to listen to scrubs like yourself. No one on here really gives a shit.

Cheers.

> You were probably reported because your attitude is trash kid. If you got a problem send it to [these](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) guys, they are paid to listen to scrubs like yourself. No one on here really gives a shit.
> 
> Cheers.

"your attitude is trash kid" oooh the irony, it oozes.
Are you saying this guy is an adult? I doubt that.
doubt u are even able to get out of bronze without a boost mate
